name: Jump Square
description:
Discover Jump Square, the new platform game by RG. Come and enjoy yourself through more than 70 levels of increasing difficulty. No need to be gifted to play: the principle of the game is simple, you must finish each level despite enemies, stopwatches and many others.
         
 You don't like the skin of departure, no problem you can change it throughout the game by choosing from more than 15 skins thanks to the store.
         
Game including an English and French version.
